Articles.Content: Hey guys (and gals)! I just thought I'd go ahead and finally post a greetings on the forum. I've actually been playing KSP for a little while now and I can truthfully say that I am in love! It all started from seeing YouTube videos of people creating these amazing rockets and planes in this amazing game, and I knew I had to have it. So yeah, I've been crashing and experimenting and crashing more, and enjoying every second of it. So there's my random hello and thoughts and whatnot, I think I'll enjoy this community fully and look forward to becoming a part of it. Thank you for your time!

Welcome, and may you continue to have lots of enjoyable and/or successful and/or hilarious missions!

(As a Kraken, though...watch out! I hear your kind is slated to be exterminated in the next version of the game. May have to play 0.16 forever just to be safe!)

(As a Kraken, though...watch out! I hear your kind is slated to be exterminated in the next version of the game. May have to play 0.16 forever just to be safe!)

I'd think it safest not to doubt the mighty spaceKraken. You might anger it.

Aaand back on topic: Wellcome on board. I don't think you are the only one led to this game by youtube. I was completely sold 10 minutes after seeing kurtjmac derping around in his letsplay.

I'd think it safest not to doubt the mighty spaceKraken. You might anger it.

Bah! The Kraken's never gotten its grubby hands on me! I ain't afraid of no...

*static*

/end transmission
Welcome aboard! The more crazy KSP fans the better!
